summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 20th Avenue Southwest from Delridge Way to West Webster Street; and certain other streets, avenues, alleys and easements; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18102 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
